name: Data Platform (ETL + Products)
summary: Core data platform responsible for ingesting, normalizing, and serving datasets consumed by multiple products and enterprise clients.
disclaimer: Professional work (proprietary). I am a contributor, not the owner. Description focuses on architecture and technical responsibilities.

products.name: CattleWiz
products.description: Cattle & beef market intelligence platform built on top of the Data Platform.

products.name: EconWiz
products.description: Economic data product extending the platform to macro and market indicators.

products.name: Custom Client Pipelines
products.description: Custom ingestion and transformation pipelines for enterprise clients (anonymized).

impact: Enabled multiple products and clients from a shared, reliable data foundation.
Improved ingestion reliability with event-driven execution and monitoring.
Standardized normalization contracts to support new products faster.
highlights: Designed ingestion adapters and normalization workflows.
Improved production stability via retries, idempotency, and monitoring.
architecture: Pub/Sub for decoupled stages and buffering
Curated datasets consumed by downstream products

name: AgriLumens
summary: Personal R&D project: precision agriculture platform to process multispectral drone imagery and generate soil insights using ML pipelines.
disclaimer: Personal project. Implementation details are summarized at a high level.
impact: Automates the workflow from drone capture → processing → inference → outputs.
Designed modular services to support multiple models/datasets over time.
highlights: Designed cloud-native architecture for imagery ingestion, processing and inference.
Integrated photogrammetry processing (ODM/NodeODM) into an automated workflow.
Built service boundaries to support future scaling and maintainability.
architecture: Job creation → processing service (ODM/NodeODM) → inference service
Artifacts in Cloud Storage; metadata tracked for traceability
Optional event-driven orchestration for long-running jobs
